trans-unit.resname: PS15·23 | Kytheon, Hero of Akros | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Kytheon, Hero of Akros
trans-unit.target: 阿喀洛斯英雄库忒昂

trans-unit.resname: PS15·23 | Kytheon, Hero of Akros | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: At end of combat, if CARDNAME and at least two other creatures attacked this combat, exile Kytheon, then return him to the battlefield transformed under his owner's control.\n{2}{W}: Kytheon gains indestructible until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 在战斗结束时，若CARDNAME和至少两个其他生物在本次战斗中攻击过，则放逐库忒昂，然后将他在其拥有者的操控下移回战场且已转化。{2}{W}：库忒昂获得不灭异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: PS15·23 | Gideon, Battle-Forged | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Gideon, Battle-Forged
trans-unit.target: 百战基定

trans-unit.resname: PS15·23 | Gideon, Battle-Forged | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: [+2]: Up to one target creature an opponent controls attacks CARDNAME during its controller's next turn if able.\n[+1]: Until your next turn, target creature gains indestructible. Untap that creature.\n[0]: Until end of turn, CARDNAME becomes a 4/4 Human Soldier creature with indestructible that's still a planeswalker. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to him this turn.
trans-unit.target: +2：至多一个目标由对手操控的生物于其操控者的下一个回合中若能攻击CARDNAME，则须如此作。+1：直到你的下一个回合，目标生物获得不灭异能。重置该生物。0：直到回合结束，CARDNAME成为4/4，具不灭异能的人类／士兵生物，且仍是鹏洛客。防止本回合中将对他造成的所有伤害。

trans-unit.resname: PS15·60 | Jace, Vryn's Prodigy | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Jace, Vryn's Prodigy
trans-unit.target: 维林逸才杰斯

trans-unit.resname: PS15·60 | Jace, Vryn's Prodigy | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card. If there are five or more cards in your graveyard, exile CARDNAME, then return him to the battlefield transformed under his owner's control.
trans-unit.target: {T}：抓一张牌，然后弃一张牌。如果你的坟墓场中有五张或更多牌，则放逐CARDNAME，然后将他在其拥有者的操控下移回战场且已转化。

trans-unit.resname: PS15·60 | Jace, Telepath Unbound | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Jace, Telepath Unbound
trans-unit.target: 通念杰斯

trans-unit.resname: PS15·60 | Jace, Telepath Unbound | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: [+1]: Up to one target creature gets -2/-0 until your next turn.\n[−3]: You may cast target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard this turn. If that spell would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead.\n[−9]: You get an emblem with "Whenever you cast a spell, target opponent mills five cards."
trans-unit.target: +1：至多一个目标生物得-2/-0直到你的下一个回合。−3：本回合中，你可以从你坟墓场中施放目标瞬间或法术牌。如果该牌于本回合中将置入你的坟墓场，则改为将其放逐。−9：你获得具有「每当你施放咒语时，目标对手将其牌库顶的五张牌置入其坟墓场」的徽记。

trans-unit.resname: PS15·106 | Liliana, Heretical Healer | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Liliana, Heretical Healer
trans-unit.target: 异端治疗师莉莲娜

trans-unit.resname: PS15·106 | Liliana, Heretical Healer | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Lifelink\nWhenever another nontoken creature you control dies, exile CARDNAME, then return her to the battlefield transformed under her owner's control. If you do, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
trans-unit.target: 系命每当另一个由你操控且非衍生物的生物死去时，放逐CARDNAME，然后将她在其拥有者的操控下移回战场且已转化。若你如此作，则将一个2/2黑色灵俑衍生生物放进战场。

trans-unit.resname: PS15·106 | Liliana, Defiant Necromancer | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Liliana, Defiant Necromancer
trans-unit.target: 无畏死灵术士莉莲娜

trans-unit.resname: PS15·106 | Liliana, Defiant Necromancer | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: [+2]: Each player discards a card.\n[−X]: Return target nonlegendary creature card with mana value X from your graveyard to the battlefield.\n[−8]: You get an emblem with "Whenever a creature dies, return it to the battlefield under your control at the beginning of the next end step."
trans-unit.target: +2：每位牌手各弃一张牌。−X：将目标总法术力费用为X且非传奇的生物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。−8：你获得具有「每当一个生物死去，在下一个结束步骤开始时，将它在你的操控下移回战场」的徽记。

trans-unit.resname: PS15·135 | Chandra, Fire of Kaladesh | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Chandra, Fire of Kaladesh
trans-unit.target: 卡拉德许之火茜卓

trans-unit.resname: PS15·135 | Chandra, Fire of Kaladesh | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast a red spell, untap CARDNAME.\n{T}: CARDNAME deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker. If Chandra has dealt 3 or more damage this turn, exile her, then return her to the battlefield transformed under her owner's control.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放红色咒语时，重置CARDNAME。{T}：CARDNAME对目标牌手造成1点伤害。如果茜卓本回合已造成3点或更多伤害，则放逐她，然后将她在其拥有者的操控下移回战场且已转化。

trans-unit.resname: PS15·135 | Chandra, Roaring Flame | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Chandra, Roaring Flame
trans-unit.target: 咆哮烈焰茜卓

trans-unit.resname: PS15·135 | Chandra, Roaring Flame | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: [+1]: CARDNAME deals 2 damage to target player or planeswalker.\n[−2]: CARDNAME deals 2 damage to target creature.\n[−7]: CARDNAME deals 6 damage to each opponent. Each player dealt damage this way gets an emblem with "At the beginning of your upkeep, this emblem deals 3 damage to you."
trans-unit.target: +1：CARDNAME对目标牌手造成2点伤害。−2：CARDNAME对目标生物造成2点伤害。−7：CARDNAME向每位对手各造成6点伤害。以此法受到伤害的每位牌手均获得具有「在你的维持开始时，此徽记对你造成3点伤害」的徽记。

trans-unit.resname: PS15·189 | Nissa, Vastwood Seer | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Nissa, Vastwood Seer
trans-unit.target: 广林预言师妮莎

trans-unit.resname: PS15·189 | Nissa, Vastwood Seer | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic Forest card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.\nWhenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, if you control seven or more lands, exile Nissa, then return her to the battlefield transformed under her owner's control.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你可以从你牌库中搜寻一张基本的树林牌，展示该牌，将它置于你手上，然后将你的牌库洗牌。每当一个地在你的操控下进战场时，若你操控七个或更多地，则放逐妮莎，然后将她在其拥有者的操控下移回战场且已转化。

trans-unit.resname: PS15·189 | Nissa, Sage Animist | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Nissa, Sage Animist
trans-unit.target: 物灵智者妮莎

trans-unit.resname: PS15·189 | Nissa, Sage Animist | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: [+1]: Reveal the top card of your library. If it's a land card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put it into your hand.\n[−2]: Create Ashaya, the Awoken World, a legendary 4/4 green Elemental creature token.\n[−7]: Untap up to six target lands. They become 6/6 Elemental creatures. They're still lands.
trans-unit.target: +1：展示你的牌库顶牌。如果该牌是地牌，则将之放进战场。若否，则将其置于你手上。−2：将一个传奇的4/4，名称为醒转天地艾莎娅之绿色元素衍生生物放进战场。−7：重置至多六个目标地。它们成为6/6元素生物。它们仍然是地。
